name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Skilled in **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Scala**, and adept with **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Grafana**. Experienced in cloud platforms like **GCP** and proficient in container orchestration tooling, including **Kubernetes**. Expert in CI/CD practices and Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery methodologies, ensuring robust deployment pipelines. 
Additionally, I bring strong organizational skills and a focus on communication that enhances product-focused development in startup and scale-up environments. Proficient in delivering solutions that comply with industry standards, I have a solid background in developing AI/ML-driven platforms utilizing my diverse skill set that includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and **event-driven architectures**.
